reviews.name: Jeremy
reviews.review:
The pros are that they are very detailed and a good size for kids to play with. Good quality construction.

The cons are...
1) The accessories are NOT interchangeable. This was very disappointing to my son who wants to change their hats/masks around.
2) The loose accessories are very tiny and basically useless other than to look at. Easy to lose.
3) You can buy both packs so you have all the figures BUT there are duplicates so you're paying for some of them twice.
4) Horribly overpriced. As if there weren't already overly expensive, after reading the cons listed above, it feels even more like a rip off.

reviews.name: Customer
reviews.review: My son was trying to collect these. They were expensive every time I would take him to the mall. Found these online has all the characters he wanted. reviews.reviewTitle: Do not put it in the dryer
reviews.review: I'm giving it four Stars, because it was super cute and looked great on my son. I would have gave it five stars except I put it in the dryer and completely ruined the shirt so he only got to wear it once. As long as you don't put it in the dryer it's totally a five-star shirt.
